text.p: Omnicare Inc said Friday it completed the previously announced acquisitions of Jacobs Health Care Systems, a privately owned institutional pharmacy provider based in Des Plaines, Ill., and Value Health Care Services Inc, a privately owned institutional pharmacy based in Southington, Conn.
Omnicare said Jacobs provides comprehensive pharmacy and consultant services to over 16,700 residents of skilled nursing and other long-term care facilities in Illinois.
Omnicare said Jacobs' revenues are currently running at an annualized rate of over $40.0 million.
Omnicare said Value provides comprehensive pharmacy services to about 7,300 residents of long-term care facilities in Connecticut.
Omnicare said Value's revenues are currently running at an annualized rate of over $14.0 million.
